entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
